description: From our law office in Lexington, Kentucky, the top-rated, award-winning attorneys at Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, provide unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout northern Kentucky who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to medical malpractice, a birth injury, a surgical or medication error, or some other act of health care negligence...
